about_the_game:
It's the 17th century, a turmoil has begun in Russia, which has led to consequences, the people are indignant, the real ruler has not appeared, and who, if not you, can unravel this mysterious story by playing for an ordinary Russian warrior.

The fate of Russia depends on you!
You are a warrior devoted to your country, who is just starting his journey, but fate has its own plans for you, you will have to solve the problems of the country that appeared due to the troubles, it's time for you to get to the truth! And punish all those who are behind it, only you can fix it!

Explore the difficult period of Russia
In the game "Real Turmoil", the main actions take place in Moscow, where the impostor False Dmitry will soon arrive, your task is to reveal the true face of False Dmitry, and show the people that he is being deceived! To do this, you will have to defeat the supporters of False Dmitry, collect the pieces of the puzzle of a complicated story, and find new friends!

Feel the Moscow of the 17th century
"Real Turmoil" invites you to explore Moscow, immerse yourself in its history, and also enjoy its view, visit the Kremlin, as well as the outskirts of the city, along the way meeting interesting people, as well as supporters of False Dmitry, be careful, and accept the challenge of fate with your head held high!

Run errands from residents
Moscow is not only a city, but also a people, so it is important that people stay calm, communicate with them, complete their tasks, learn useful
information, or simply help those in need. Together you are a force!

Fight for the truth!
You will be given a choice of different weapons, which you will either find yourself or buy. To do this, you will have to look for resources, or perform various tasks, it all depends on your choice, the enemies will not stand still either, so it's better to upgrade!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10105 or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400f or AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 7600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Real Turmoil is an RPG game about the time of troubles in Russia, where you go to seek the truth, fight enemies on your way, complete tasks from residents and help them, and also save Russia itself!
